attributes.action: Reinstate Carol Hill and Sack the School Govenor Concerned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A dinner lady has been sacked for telling parents their daughter had been bullied.Carol Hill, who worked at Great Tey Primary School in Essex, was said to have broken rules on confidentiality. She says she acted after seeing a seven-year-old girl tied to a fence and whipped with a skipping rope. The bully was the son of a governor at the school. I smell a cover up. Who is being bullied now

rejection.details: This is a matter better the individual and her employer, the local educational authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
